name: 蕭榮修
objective: 瞭解常見之演算法及其分析，1.Complexity、Big-Oh符號，2.演算法之分析，3.集合、優先佇列，4.樹、平衡樹，5.排序演算法，6.搜尋演算法，7.圖形演算法，8.幾何演算法，9.NP-complete problems之理論及對策。
schedule:
Mathematical Foundations
1.       ‧  Introduction
2.       ‧  Analyzing and Designing Algorithms
3.       ‧  Growth of Functions
4.       ‧  Recurrences
Sorting and Order Statistics
5.       ‧  Heapsort
6.       ‧  Quicksort
7.       ‧  Sorting in Linear Time
8.       ‧  Medians and Order Statistics
9. Mid-term Exam
Advanced Design and Analysis Techniques
10.      ‧  Greedy Algorithms
11.      ‧  Dynamic Programming-I
12.      ‧  Dynamic Programming-II
Graph Algorithms
13.      ‧  Elementary Graph Algorithms
14.      ‧  Minimum Spanning Trees
15.      ‧  Shortest Paths Algorithms-I
16.      ‧  Shortest Paths Algorithms-II
17. NP-Completeness
18. Final Exam
scorePolicy:
10% Attendance and Quizzes
30% Assignments
30% Mid-term Exam
30% Final Exam
materials: Introduction to Algorithms, Second Ed., T. H. Cormen, C. E. Leiserson, R. L. Rivest, and C. Stein, The MIT Press, 2001.  (開發)
